thread.title: Adult Film Company Filming A WWE Parody On The Montreal Screwjob With Vince McMahon, Others (Photos)
thread.title_full: Adult Film Company Filming A WWE Parody On The Montreal Screwjob With Vince McMahon, Others (Photos)

title: Adult Film Company Filming A WWE Parody On The Montreal Screwjob With Vince McMahon, Others (Photos)
text:
By Marc Middleton | February 22, 2017 
Adult film company Brazzers is producing a parody of WWE's infamous Montreal Screwjob, featuring actress Mia Malkova as WWE Hall of Famer Shawn Michaels, Romi Rain as WWE Hall of Famer Bret Hart and Johnny Castle as Vince McMahon. Filming began this week but there's no word yet on when the movie will be released. It appears "The F***job" is the name of the movie.
Below are a few photos of the actors and the Brazzers World Title from this week:
